group.headline: Team Fortress Portal (TFC, TF2, FF & more)

group.headline: Team Fortress 2 Community Evaluation Group
group.summary:
Welcome to the Worlds Largest Team Fortress 2 Steam community by www.AFWarehouse.com and www.AFNation.com

The purpose of this group is to help all Team Fortress 2 players find the perfect community and servers to become part of . And to promote the good TF2 communities that are out there. AFWarehouse.com and AFNation.com teams will send out staff to visit and maybe even join communities to evaluate their members, rules, and server quality.

Know ahead of time which servers will make you feel welcome, exhibit player teamwork, respect players, or promote player abuse.

When our evaluation is complete, we will write up the evaluation for all players to view. There is nothing worse than expending time and energy into a community, only to find out that your donated funds were used to pay for someones supercomputer , when you thought you were supporting a community.

We will publish events from the good communities so that you will be notified when something is going on through our events notification system.

Communities that would like to be evaluated, email your community website address to support@afwarehouse.com

group.headline: Welcome to the public steam group for the [-Q-] community!
group.summary:
The [-Q-] clan is a multi-gaming clan consisting primarily of North American West Coast players.

We are the largest clan specific Steam community group, and founders of The Teamwork Movement (the second largest Steam community group with over 33,000 members). Our servers are some of the most popular in their respective categories, and run on some of the best hardware available to give you, the user, an unmatched gaming experience.

While you may not see any incentive to join [-Q-] over any random server in the server listings, the [-Q-] servers truly do take a game to a new level. Our servers' are unrivaled in quality because of our admins, our hardware and our regulars. The combination of the three provides you with extremely responsive/lag free servers, along with skilled regulars to play with at every hour of the day.

If you're skeptical, I strongly encourage you to at least go on to the [-Q-] servers for five minutes. It's the easiest way to see what makes our community so remarkable!

[-Q-] Server Listings:

Counter-Strike Source

[-Q-] 24/7 Office [No Awp/Auto] (32 Players) - 209.160.36.102
[-Q-] Rotation Server [2 Awp/1 Auto] (32 Players) - 209.160.36.103
[-Q-] GunGame Server (24 Players) - 209.160.36.104

Team Fortress 2

[-Q-] 24/7 2Fort (24 Players) - 209.160.36.105
[-Q-] Rotation Server (24 Players) - 209.160.36.107

Day of Defeat: Source

[-Q-] Rotation Server (32 Players) - 209.160.43.61

We hope to see you there!

group.headline: Figh7Club
group.summary:
Videospiele und Entertainment - das findest du bei uns in der Online-Community Figh7Club! Schau noch heute bei uns vorbei und finde News, Artikel und vieles mehr.

Der Figh7Club vereint mehrere Communities zu verschiedenen Videospielen. Wir bieten neben grossen Diskussionsforen viele Aktivitäten rund um ausgesuchte Spiele.

group.headline: The Teamwork Movement (TWM) aims to bring teamwork oriented players together for the best gaming experience possible.
group.summary:
The Teamwork Movement (TWM) is not a clan, it's an open group of players that anyone can join, as long as they're interested in utilizing teamwork while gaming. TWM participants are encouraged, but not required, to add <TWM> to the end of their name and play on TWM endorsed servers. By adding TWM to the end of your name you're easily recognizable by other TWM participants, so they can engage in teamwork with you; and by playing on TWM endorsed servers you are much more likely to encounter other TWM participants, and have the best gaming experience as a result.

While we encourage TWM members to engage in teamwork regardless of what server they play on, we maintain a list of recommended servers which TWM players frequent. By playing on TWM endorsed servers you are much more likely to play with other TWM participants, resulting in the best gaming experience possible. All TWM endorsed servers go through a rigorous approval process that ensures they are lag-free, popular and well administered. You can find the most up to date list of TWM endorsed servers at the following link:

http://www.theTWM.com/

In addition to the endorsed server list we regularly use the Steam event system to send out notifications of TWM events. Several times throughout the day we'll issue an event alert with a TWM endorsed server's IP, by joining in on those games you get to join a server filled entirely with TWM players -- you'll experience teamwork like you've never experienced before.

So, to recap, all you need to do is (all of these are optional):
- Add <TWM> to the end of your name.
- Play on TWM endorsed servers so you can easily find other teamwork oriented players. The IP for TWM endorsed servers can be found at the "TWM Endorsed Server List" link below.
- Engage in teamwork whenever possible!

Frag on!

group.headline: ★中国玩家联盟★
group.summary:
中国玩家公共群组，团结全球华人玩家，欢迎大家邀请其他华人玩家加入！

Chinese players' group of public and unite Chinese players all over the world, welcome to invite all the other Chinese players to join!

只要你是华人，不论你生活在台湾，新加坡，东南亚，欧洲，美国或其他国家，我们欢迎您的加入！

As long as you are Chinese, you may join our fabulous and enjoyful group! We do not FLAME each other, meaning we do not argue for just a random reason, we help each other. If you do, please leave our group, we do not like people who acts immature. Well, not to be mean or something, this group is meant for everyone who is Chinese. As long as you are nice and helpful with each other, this group's heart will never be broken. Remember to invite people, we shall be the #1 group for CHINA in the future. Thanks for reading!!!



P.S. DO NOT FLAMEZ! BE NICE OR MEET HIM <(*,..,*)> hugz?

China was a very tiny country, but due to hard working chinese ( we or some -.- ) expanding our empire............today, China is in the top 3! Miltary powered country. China can dominate any country in asia right now with the Nuclear age. The sleeping dragon will once awake, and the dragon will dominate its land once again!



WHY CHINA IS AWESOME

★ China is a great country with five thousand years history, the empires and people all worked for today, which is a freaking awesome place to live in. (YAY for our ancestors)

★ 中国是一个有五千年历史的大国。

★ It stands in Asia and lies on the west coast of the ocean and that is how we can get fishes.

★ 她地处亚洲，位于太平洋西岸。

★ China covers 9,600,000square kilometers, most of Asia.

★ 中国拥有960万平方公里的国土，是东亚第一大国。

★ People of about 1.3billion live and work together on the land for our country to be better.

★ 13亿人在这块土地上一起工作，生活，为了我们的国家更为强大。

★ 56 nations make up the whole population of China and when we say 56 nations = China, we mean it.

★ 56个民族组成了伟大的中华民族。

★ China is becoming much more stronger, better, and more advance technology, if this keeps on advancing, China will be #1!

★ 中国正在变的越来越强，她将一直保持下去，一定会成为世界第一！

★ Imagine the world without China, the world will not have Compass, chinese herbs(medicines), common sense, math, better rice, crossbow, and much more (including population) If China is not here, the dragon will now be woken up, but guess what, the Dragon is about to rise again, our powerful nation will rule the world without causing wars, but peace and society. We all hope that China will rise again, building a vast empire.
LONG LIVE CHINA, THE SLEEPING OF THE DRAGON IS ABOUT TO END!

★ 中国万岁！沉睡的巨龙即将觉醒！迎来中华民族的伟大复兴！



It has been a while... heh. 3 years already. Guess time really goes fast.. -Devine

Ha csatlakozni szeretnél, kérdésed vagy véleményed van, további információért látogasd meg az alább hivatkozott témát a Steam fórumokon.

group.headline: Steam магазин, общност и игри на български език
group.summary:
Тази група е създадена заради извършването на проекта за превод на Steam на родния ни език, другари българи. Лесно може да се кандидатирате и да помогнете за превеждането на любимата ви игра от Valve. Прочетете правилата и повече за извършването на дейността ни от връзките по-долу, или просто задайте въпрос в коментарите, ще ви отговорим с радост.

Активните модератори, които са назначени от Valve, засега са:
Mu6o, WildBeλ³st, sappy, papyrus_kn, OSMO и Selene


Дата на стартиране на превода: 14.10.2010г. в 22:00ч.
No information given.

group.headline: International Meeting Place For Steam Translators
group.summary:
The Translators' Lounge is our international meeting place. It's invite-only, since we want to keep it clean. If you would like to join, just ask one of your language's translators.

As a special feature, the Translators' Lounge automatically posts announcements on the arrival of new strings on STS, this way you will always be up-to-date without much of a hassle. If you prefer Twitter over Steam, you may also follow our official Twitter account.
The Team Fortress 2 Crafting Advisor is a tool that helps you to manage your Team Fortress 2 items by showing you how to utilize them thoroughly.

Steam Translation Server Members - Korean
Not official. Invites only.

Official Team (invites only): http://steamcommunity.com/groups/kalve
